remarks: Every set is well-founded, assuming the Axiom of Regularity. Proposition 9.13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 78.  This variant of ~ tz9.13 expresses the class existence requirement as an antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.)
